import React from 'react'; export class SearchBasic extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { area : '', country : '', dateD : '', dateM : '', dateY : '', class : '', } } changeHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault() this.setState({ [e.target.name] : e.target.value, }) } render() { return (
); } }
